Package itec3030.assignments.a2

Class NewTempSensorAdapter

java.lang.Object
itec3030.assignments.a2.NewTempSensorAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
itec3030.assignments.a2.AbstractNewTempSensorAdapter, itec3030.smarthome.standards.Controllable, itec3030.smarthome.standards.NumericMeasurementInstrument, itec3030.smarthome.standards.SmartThing, itec3030.smarthome.standards.TemperatureSensor, newtemp.NewTempSensor.Observer
public class NewTempSensorAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements itec3030.smarthome.standards.TemperatureSensor, itec3030.assignments.a2.AbstractNewTempSensorAdapter, newtemp.NewTempSensor.Observer
An adapter for the NewTempSensorDriver that complies with the observer pattern that NewTemp imposes. This adapter makes NewTempSensorDriver compatible with SSDCS standards.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    NewTempSensorAdapter()
    Creates a new NewTempSensorAdapter and registers it as an Observer of its adaptee the NewTempSensorDriver
